entry.title: Vite report on Thu, 16 Nov 2023 20:02:05
entry.summary:
Tech:
- Google Deepmind and YouTube unveil new Lyria AI model for music generation
- DOS_deck: Play DOS games in the browser with full controller support
- Windows is now an app for iPhones, iPads, Macs, and PCs
- YouTube teases AI tool that clones famous singers — with their permission
- Epic is going to let you report voice conversations in Fortnite
- With Muse, Unity aims to give developers generative AI that’s useful and ethical
- Build a Responsive Space Travel Agency Website | HTML , CSS And JavaScript
- Shopping Crate & Barrel’s new virtual store feels like playing a video game
- Outer space is full of human trash. Now we have to get rid of it
- Antitrust lawsuits are piling up for Google. Here’s how they could change the company
- Spotify’s podcast and audiobook discovery will get a boost from Google Cloud’s AI
- ‘Armored Core VI’ Gets Its First Robot Damashii Toy And It’s An End Game Boss

Business:
- Investors Met With Slowing Returns on Capital At John Wiley & Sons (NYSE:WLY) - Simply Wall St
- Rick Lang Obituary - Wiley Funeral Home - Granbury - 2023 - Legacy.com
- Real estate made China rich. Now it's looking more like kryptonite.
- Inside the Autumn issue: We decide what the future looks like
- The CEO of Ford is throwing shade at the Cybertruck's viral — and messy — attempt to drive up a dirt hill
- Article: Agile Coaching as a Path toward a Deeper Meaning of Work and Life

AI:
- Google DeepMind wants to define what counts as artificial general intelligence

Other:
- I left NYC and moved to Eastern Europe after my divorce — but here's what I wish I would've done differently
- Why disinformation experts say the Israel-Hamas war is a nightmare to investigate
- This Youth Detention Center Superintendent Illegally Locks Kids Alone in Cells. No One Has Forced Him to Stop.
- A reporter drove a Rivian to 126 EV fast-chargers in LA and found out-of-order signs on dozens of them
- The Biggest Questions: Why is the universe so complex and beautiful?
- Planet Where It Rains Sand Is A ‘Pivotal Milestone’ Say Scientists
- Planet Where It Rains Sand Is A ‘Pivotal Milestone’ Say Scientists

Insights:
- The tech section highlights advancements in AI, gaming, virtual reality, and space travel.
- The business section discusses the financial performance of John Wiley & Sons and the impact of real estate in China.
- The AI section focuses on Google DeepMind's efforts to define artificial general intelligence.
- The other section covers personal experiences, social issues, and environmental concerns.
- Overall, the report showcases the latest developments in technology, business, AI, and other areas, providing insights into various topics of interest.
